text: Franz Seldte (29 June 1882 in Magdeburg – 1 April 1947 in Fürth) was the co- founder of the Stahlhelm, Bund der Frontsoldaten. He was a member of the NSDAP. He was also a minister of the Third Reich. title: Franz Seldte
